attributes.action: Lessen the role of religion in Parliament and in making new laws
attributes.background: Religion is an outdated concept and still uses old, draconian rules in these modern times, so we should weaken the power of the ancient cults in parliament as it is a backwards step in society

rejection.details: Petitions must call for clear, specific action from the Government or Parliament. For example, you could start a petition calling for the Lords Spiritual (the bishops in the House of Lords) to be removed from Parliament.
